title: Ticket #5289: condor_userprio can't locate negotiator in local pool
description:
Every so often condor_userprio will exit with code 1: 

  root@pcdev1:/usr/local/sbin# condor_userprio
  condor_userprio: Can't locate negotiator in local pool
  root@pcdev1:/usr/local/sbin# echo $?
  1

Several seconds later I ran the date command: 

  root@pcdev1:/usr/local/sbin# date
  Fri Oct  2 11:25:43 CDT 2015

The machines are all synchronized to within milliseconds of the same source. I will attach the NegotiatorLog for the time period in question.
attachments: • negotlog 297498 bytes added by tpdownes on 2015-Oct-02 16:33:24 UTC.
creator: tpdownes
